name: Tavern
description: An empty tavern, you can go outside via a door to your south, or up, there is a table and a mug
onLook: It's an empty tavern, you can go outside via a door to your south, or up, there is a table [[imug01:taken:false==and a mug]]

name: Bedroom
description: An empty bedroom, there is a bed, a stairwell leads down, a box shows the number [[ibox:val:val]]
onLook: An empty bedroom, there is a bed, a stairwell leads down

name: Outside
description: It is dark, there is a tavern to your east[[routside:moon:true==, the moon is out]]
